means: 收音机，无线电报，射线照相

sentence.Network_en: Do you mind turning down the radiogram a little?
sentence.Network_cn: 你介意把你的收音机关小一点 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: At 8 P . M. Bormann got out a radiogram to Doenitz.
sentence.Network_cn: 晚上八点钟, 鲍曼打了一个无线电报给邓尼茨.

sentence.Network_en: Would you play a record on the radiogram?
sentence.Network_cn: 你在电唱机上放张唱片听好 吗 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2004年8月29日 - 当时有些公司专营海缆电报(cablegram),另一些公司专营无线电报(Radiogram),大东电报局采用Cable&Wireless(C&W)的名称正是为了标榜其全面开发了当时的.

means.word_mean: 1. a message transmitted by wireless telegraphy
2. a photographic image produced on a radiosensitive surface by radiation other than visible light (especially by X-rays or gamma rays)
